posts.post_content:
After selling about half of my little stash of 1909 Obaks on the Net 54 auction venue, I'm going to try a fixed price sale. Any that remain unsold about a week from now will go to auction.

Price is $75 delivered.

The buyer will be the first person to "claim" the card at my price on this thread. Payment can be via PayPal, check or m.o.

Here's future Yankee and Red Sox "Million Dollar Outfield" member Duffy Lewis in his only Obak appearance.

Card grades Good with a heavy horizontal crease and the other edge and corner wear you'd expect.

[IMG]http://www.net54baseball.com/attachment.php?attachmentid=3795&d=1249043893[/IMG]
